View Javadoc
1   package com.googlecode.download.maven.plugin.internal.cache;
2   
3   import java.net.URI;
4   
5   /**
6    * Convenient map to search for the path where file is locally stored
7    * by uri of the resource the file was downloaded from.
8    * Implementations should not read/write file bodies using stored paths.
9    *
10   * @author Paul Polishchuk
11   * @since 1.3.1
12   */
13  interface FileIndex {
14  
15      /**
16       * Adds given path to the index using uri parameter as a key.
17       * @param uri index key
18       * @param path index value
19       */
20      void put(URI uri, String path);
21  
22      /**
23       * Check if a path associated with the uri key in the index.
24       * <p>Use this method before actually trying to get value.
25       * @param uri index key
26       * @return true if some path associated with given key
27       */
28      boolean contains(URI uri);
29  
30      /**
31       * Gets stored value by the key.
32       * @param uri index key
33       * @return path by given uri key; never NULL
34       * @throws IllegalStateException in case key is not found
35       */
36      String get(URI uri);
37  }
